newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: RTRS-Singapore Airlines not considering Air NZ stake.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Singapore Airlines not considering Air NZ stake.

text.p: Singapore Airlines Ltd's New Zealand manager poured cold water on Wednesday on speculation that the airline was about to buy into Air New Zealand Ltd.
The media has speculated SIA would buy Qantas' 19.9 percent stake or Air NZ 'B' shares (able to be owned by foreign investors) held by Brierley Investments Ltd.
Boon Khim Ong told The Dominion newspaper there had been no discussion with Qantas.
"It (purchase of the stake) is not something we are considering at this time," he said.
On Tuesday Air New Zealand announced that it had formed a code-sharing partnership with United Airlines and signalled that further alliances were likely.
